alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 16 at 2:13AM EDT until June 16 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR PENSACOLA METRO AND GULF BREEZE ... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 715 AM CDT Friday. * At 113 AM CDT, Life threatening flooding has spread across Pensacola and the adjacent barrier islands. Emergency management reports significant flooding across the area with roads inundated. Public reports of 3 to 4 feet of water along highway 98 around Gulf Breeze and the Pensacola ASOS station has recorded over 9 inches the past 6 hours and 3 inches the past hour. Between 8 and 13 inches of rain have fallen across the entire warned area. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Pensacola Metro and Gulf Breeze . This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency Management and public reported. IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ferry Pass, Brent, Goulding, Oriole Beach, Olive, Avondale, Bellview, Ramsey Beach and Millview. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CATASTROPHIC EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...2-3.25 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
